greenmirror.client

Class ModelTransition

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenmirror.client.ModelTransition

  • public class ModelTransition
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that stores the execution of state-transitions. These instances should be defined by the model initializers. Whenever a transition is encountered on a trace that matches the pattern of an instance of ModelTransition, the code from the closure is executed and that should actually execute the state-transition. This class is only used on the client side.
    Author:
    Karim El Assal

      • execute

        public java.lang.Object execute(@NonNull java.lang.String traceTransition)
        Executes the closure of this transition while extracting its optional arguments from traceTransition. If traceTransition doesn't match this transition's Pattern or the closure is null, nothing happens and null is returned.
        Parameters:
        traceTransition - a transition given by a trace.
        Returns:
        the return value of the Closure; null if traceTransition doesn't match the Pattern
